text: Christian Congregation may refer to: *Local church, a Christian body of followers meeting in a particular area *Christian Congregation (Pentecostal), an organization of Pentecostal churches with roots in the Italian Pentecostal Movement **Christian Congregation in the United States **Christian Congregation of Brazil **Christian Congregation in Ireland *Christian Congregation (Restoration Movement), a Congregational church in the United States *Christian Congregation of Jehovah's Witnesses, a Jehovah's Witnesses organization in the United States
title: Christian Congregation
